s2.title: SEnumVal
s2.p: SEnumVal shows how to enumerate the markup declarations in a Schema Grammar.

s3.title: Running SEnumVal
s3.p: This program parses the specified XML file, then shows how to enumerate the contents of the Schema Grammar.
s3.source:
Usage: SEnumVal <XML file>
This program parses a file, then shows how to enumerate the contents of the Schema Grammar. Essentially, shows how one can access the Schema information stored in internal data structures.
s3.p: Here is a sample output from SEnumVal
s3.source:
